data.title: Ubisoft Blue Byte Developed Games
data.meta_description: Blue Byte Software (now known as Ubisoft Blue Byte) is a German computer game developer based in Düsseldorf. The company, which had been active as a publisher for many years as well, is one of the most well known German developers.
data.text:
The Settlers: New Allies

February 17, 2023

PC

XONE

+ 4 more

PS4

NSW

PS5

XSX

The new entry in the traditional kingdom sim series goes back to the roots, produced by the creator of the series: Volker Wertich.

Anno History Collection

June 25, 2020

PC

A bundle containing the first 4 Anno games, remastered in 4k with a revamped multiplayer mode: Anno 1404, Anno 1503, Anno 1602 and Anno 1701.

Anno 1701 - History Edition

June 25, 2020

PC

Anno 1701 returns in 4k, with an updated multiplayer interface in the new History Edition.

Anno 1602 - History Edition

June 25, 2020

PC

The first ever Anno game from the series, Anno 1602 is back with a new multiplayer experience, in 4k, and with multiple QoL updates in the History Edition.

Anno 1503 - History Edition

June 25, 2020

PC

With an updated multiplayer interface and possibility to play in 4k, Anno 1503 returns in the History Edition.

Anno 1404 - History Edition

June 25, 2020

PC

The History Edition of Anno 1404 revamps the multiplayer experience and tweaks the graphics to today's standards, making it possible to play in 4k.

Anno 1800

April 16, 2019

PC

PS5

XSX

Anno 1800 returns the city building franchise into the past, focusing on the industrial revolution.

Assassin's Creed Identity

September 30, 2014

IPHN

IPAD

ANDR

Action RPG game for mobile devices that lets players create, develop and customize their own Assassins and play as them in the classic Assassin's Creed era: the Italian Renaissance.

Anno-Online

January 31, 2013

MAC

PC

Anno Online is a free-to-play city-builder game that lets players develop big magnificent metropolises in the medieval times.

Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2013

November 13, 2012

WiiU

Even more fitness from Ubisoft, now for the Wii U.

Anno 2070

November 17, 2011

PC

Anno 2070, a part of Ubisoft's strategy franchise Anno, ditches historical settings for a futuristic one. The focus of the game stays true to the series formula of building up cities through exploration and resource management.

The Settlers 7: Paths to a Kingdom

March 23, 2010

MAC

PC

Settlers 7: Paths to a Kingdom is the seventh installment in this long running light real time strategy / kingdom management series.

Dawn of Discovery: Venice

February 26, 2010

PC

Known as Dawn of Discovery: Venice in North America, this expansion pack brings multiplayer action to the popular series.

The Settlers II Mission CD

August 20, 2009

PC

An add-on pack for The Settlers II, featuring new quests and factions to play.

Dawn of Discovery

June 17, 2009

PC

Known as Dawn of Discovery in North America, Anno 1404 is the fourth game in popular city management series.

The Settlers: Rise of an Empire – The Eastern Realm

March 27, 2008

PC

The Settlers: Rise of an Empire - The Eastern Realm is the expansion to the 2007 Real Time Strategy game, The Settlers: Rise of an Empire.

The Settlers II: 10th Anniversary

September 7, 2006

PC

The Settlers II: 10th Anniversary is a remake of the original "The Settlers II" game. It features updated graphics and a slghtly altered gameplay.

Heritage of Kings: The Settlers

February 18, 2005

PC

Heritage of Kings is a real time strategy game from Blue Byte Software. It is the fifth installment in The Settlers series.
